sources.name: LKPTRANS_1
sources.script:
source(output(
		bnk_id as string,
		bnk_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		state_code as string,
		contact_no as string,
		no_of_branches as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LKPTRANS_1

sources.name: load_bnk_src
sources.script:
source(output(
		bnk_id as decimal(10,0),
		bnk_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		state_code as decimal(10,0),
		contact_no as decimal(10,0),
		no_of_branches as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> load_bnk_src

transformations.name: EXPTRANS1
transformations.script:
EXPTRANS, LKPTRANS derive(bnk_id = bnk_id,
		address = address,
		city = city,
		contact_no = contact_no,
		no_of_branches = no_of_branches,
		upper_bnk_name = upper_bnk_name) ~> EXPTRANS1

transformations.name: SRTTRANS
transformations.script:
EXPTRANS1 sort(asc(upper_bnk_name,true),
	asc(address,true),
	asc(city,true),
	asc(contact_no,true),
	asc(no_of_branches,true)) ~> SRTTRANS

transformations.name: AGGTRANS
transformations.script:
SRTTRANS aggregate(groupBy(upper_bnk_name,
		address,
		city,
		contact_no,
		bnk_id),
	avg_branches = average(no_of_branches)) ~> AGGTRANS

transformations.name: SEQTRANS
transformations.script:
AGGTRANS keyGenerate(output(s_no as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SEQTRANS

transformations.name: LKPTRANS
transformations.script:
EXPTRANS, LKPTRANS_1 lookup(load_bnk_src@bnk_id == LKPTRANS_1@bnk_id,
	broadcast: 'none') ~> LKPTRANS
